ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. PATRICK J. DUNCAN, who was required to relocate to the city of Digby in Halifax following his appointment as a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia on November 29, 2007.
AttachmentsAttachment
